page_description.home: 裕承科金有限公司（0279.HK）成立于2021年10月，是一家总部设于香港的综合金融服务机构，致力于增强科技在金融领域的应用。

page_description.asset_management: 我们的资产管理业务主要为机构客户和家庭办公室提供专业的投资管理和顾问服务。
page_description.investment_banking: 我们的投资银行业务提供广泛的投资银行产品和服务。
page_description.insurance_brokerage: 我们的保险经纪业务提供多种类型的人寿保险和一般保险产品、量身定制的保险服务和风险管理解决方案。
page_description.global_markets: 我们的环球市场业务提供一站式的投资平台，并带来金融服务的新体验。
page_description.artazine: Artazine提供关于艺术、文化、加密货币、NFT、元宇宙、以及游戏等领域的最新新闻、分析和采访。

page_description.esg_advisory: 我們的ESG顧問業務以科技為驅動力、以事實為依據，旨在為客戶提供定製化的路線圖和平台，幫助整合ESG與公司業務，以符合監管要求，並與持份者進行溝通。

join_us.privacy_policy: 我同意按照隐私政策处理我的个人信息
join_us.thanks: 感谢您对裕承科金的关注！
join_us.thanks_message:
我们已收到您的申请。我们的人力资本管理团队将会仔细查看您的信息。如果我们在四个星期内未联络您，则默认此次申请未能成功。
如欲了解更多资讯，请访问我们的领英主页：https://www.linkedin.com/company/arta-techfin-corporation-limited。
join_us.accept_privacy_policy: 本人确认已经阅读、理解、同意隐私政策声明，并同意本人提供的个人信息可由裕承科金用于企业招聘。

investor_relations.esg_the_board_content:
• 监督公司的风险管理政策和流程
  • 检讨并确保公司已维持和实施有效且充足的风险管理和内部监控系统
  • 确定新出现的和现有风险的性质和程度
investor_relations.esg_head_of_departments_content:
• 识别、评估及管理公司面临的重大营运风险
  • 监察风险管理及内部控制系统并实施新的监控措施
investor_relations.esg_unit_subtitle: （营运风险及内部监控所有权）
investor_relations.esg_unit_content:
• 于各部门进行风险识别、评估及减缓
  • 于业务营运和职能方面实行

page_description.home: ARTA TechFin (0279.HK) is a Hong Kong-based financial services institution that aspires to enhance applications in finance through the use of technology.
page_description.about_us: ARTA TechFin (0279.HK) is a Hong Kong-based financial services institution that aspires to enhance applications in finance through the use of technology.
page_description.investor_relations: Investor Relations - ARTA TechFin (0279.HK) is a Hong Kong-based financial services institution that aspires to enhance applications in finance through the use of technology.
page_description.media_centre: Media Centre - ARTA TechFin (0279.HK) is a Hong Kong-based financial services institution that aspires to enhance applications in finance through the use of technology.
page_description.join_us: If you think this is the right place for you to be your true self, click on the links today. Join us.
page_description.contact_us: Contact Us - If you have any questions or comment, please click the following button and complete the form.
page_description.disclaimer: All information contained in this website is provided for reference only and is subject to change without notice.
page_description.privacy_policy: This Privacy Policy Statement outlines ARTA TechFin’s practices and the choices you have concerning the collection and use of your personal data.
page_description.asset_management: Our Asset Management division provides provide professional investment management and advisory primarily to institutional clients and family offices.
page_description.investment_banking: Our Investment Banking division offers a broad range of investment banking products and services.
page_description.insurance_brokerage: Our Insurance Brokerage division offers all types of life and general insurance products, tailor-made insurance services and risk solutions.
page_description.global_markets: Our Global Markets division provides clients with an all-in-one platform and a new experience in finance.
page_description.artazine: Artazine delivers the latest news, analysis and interviews on art, culture, crypto, NFT, Metaverse, and gaming trends and happenings.
page_description.media_center: Media Centre - ARTA TechFin (0279.HK) is a Hong Kong-based financial services institution that aspires to enhance applications in finance through the use of technology.
page_description.press_release: Press Release - ARTA TechFin (0279.HK) is a Hong Kong-based financial services institution that aspires to enhance applications in finance through the use of technology.
page_description.esg_advisory: Our ESG Advisory offering is technology-enabled and evidence-based, designed to provide each client a bespoke roadmap and platform on how to integrate ESG into your business, meet regulatory requirements and communicate with stakeholders.

join_us.thanks: Thank you for your interest in ARTA TechFin！
join_us.thanks_message:
This message acknowledges that we have received your application. Our Human Capital Management team will carefully review your application and get in touch with you if your profile meets our business requirements. If you do not hear from us for more than 4 weeks, please assume your application was unsuccessful.
For more updates, please visit our LinkedIn page: https://www.linkedin.com/company/arta-techfin-corporation-limited
join_us.accept_privacy_policy: I confirm that I have read, understood, and agreed to the Privacy Policy, and I agree that all personal data provided by me may be used by ARTA TechFin for employment recruitment.

investor_relations.esg_the_board_content:
• Oversees the Company’s risk management policies and process
  • Reviews and ensures that the Group has maintained and carried out effective and appropriate risk management and internal control systems
  • Determines the nature and extent of the outstanding emerging and existing risks
investor_relations.esg_head_of_departments_content:
• Identifies, assesses and manages the significant operating risks facing the Company
  • Monitors the risk management and internal control systems and implements new controls
investor_relations.esg_unit_content:
• Risk identification, assessment and mitigation performed across various departments
  • Practices across business operations and functional areas
  • Monitors the risk management and internal control systems and implements new controls
